column5: Can anyone tell me where to get bait in Sask.? I am going up the 25th of Sept. Going from Minot ND to Yorkton to Nipawin. Thanks
I hope you know that the Vanity is on that week and that means bumper boats. As per bait you must mean leaches and because of the warm weather there is not much around.
Yes I know the Vanity cup is the same time. I was looking for leeches and Ciscoes. Thanks for the help. Jimbo
